ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: 570 covers the basic tools of quantum mechanics. For me, the class was also an introduction in proofs of theories which I gained a lot from. The class was a good fit for me in that way. Again, the speed of the class was quite a downside. But this class and the compliment of knowledge from Mol Rad has given me quite a basis of understanding in the field of physical chemistry.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: I learned a lot about theories and how they are proven and the thought process put into them. I hope those mental exercises will help me in my future work in physical chemistry.
